ygData.subject: FEW QUESTIONS
ygData.msgSnippet: Im in Povar, New L16 Gnome necro, and cannot locate two spells; Banshee Aura and Restless Bones.  Gnome guild doesn t have these.  Where can I find them? How
ygData.messageBody:
Im in Povar, New L16 Gnome necro, and cannot locate two spells; Banshee
Aura and Restless Bones. Gnome guild doesn't have these. Where can I find
them? How best to and get them?

How best to control a pet, such as in Unrest? While in the Castle in CB it
ran away and I lost 2 pets that way. Would not respond to commands even
tho alive. I found a L16 spell not familiar with; Spirit Armor? And
lastly, with Heat Blood, Engulf Darkness, and Heart Flutter, if all stacked
about how much damage done?

Thanks for any help!

PS

As I go up it appears its better strategy to make max use of pet and not do
much melee; if so, how best to heal pet, and do I med, if possible, while
he fites (keeping a chk on health), then heal him up?
